node.title: If you thought foxes were cunning, wait until you hear this
node.description: Environmental groups are worried for shorebirds as foxes use low tide to access a remote island off Victoria's coast.
node.content:
["The hooded plover, crested tern and other shorebirds are \"easy prey\" for foxes using low tide to swim to the remote Dream island off eastern Victoria's southern coastline during low tide, Landcare workers say.\u00a0", "Dream Island is located\u00a0off the coast of McLoughlins Beach in South Gippsland and forms part of the\u00a0Nooramunga Marine and Coastal Park.", "The distance from shore varies with the tide, and sometimes a sandbar connects the landmass to the coast.", "Bass Coast Landcare Network's pest plant and animal coordinator, Jason Good, said when foxes were young\u00a0they needed to find their own territory, which could lead to unusual behaviour including swimming to Dream Island at low tide.", "Mr Good said the\u00a0abundance of nesting birds and minimal human activity on the island\u00a0had attracted foxes.", "\"In terms of stopping foxes getting to the island, that's a bit of a tricky one,\" he said.", "\"There's not a lot you can do, so it's going to be an\u00a0ongoing program,\" he said.", "West Gippsland Catchment Management Authority and\u00a0Parks Victoria have\u00a0been working with traditional owners from the Gunaikurnai to try to eliminate foxes from the long, thin island through bating efforts.", "", "
Hooded plovers are listed as vulnerable on the International Union for Conservation of Nature's red list of threatened species.(Supplied:\u00a0Ed Nunans via Wikimedia Commons)
", "
Invasive species wreaking havoc nationwide
", "Invasive Species Council project officer Peter Jacobs said there was \"no time to waste\" in fixing the problems associated with invasive plants and animals.", "\"Foxes and cats are a great example of introduced predators that are having a big impact on our biodiversity.\"", "Mr Jacobs said foxes, deer,\u00a0and feral cats were a \"particular concern\" across the east coast of Australia.", "\"People can do a lot to help the situation whether it's reporting incursions of feral animals on things like FeralScan or joining Landcare groups,\" he said.", "", "
The financial cost of Australia's invasive species, per plant and animal species.(Supplied: Flinders University)
", "
Protecting biodiversity in the region
", "A $6 million fence is being built by Parks Victoria to keep invasive species out of Wilsons Promontory National Park.", "Parks Victoria manager of ecology and strategy Ben Fahey said invasive species such as foxes and feral cats posed a \"significant risk\" to the survival of the long-nosed potoroo and southern brown bandicoot on the promontory.", "\"This fence provides an opportunity to set our\u00a0sights on eradication of cats, foxes and deer from Wilsons Promontory National Park,\" he said.", "The stretch of 10-kilometre fencing across the National Park would safeguard the unique coastal landscape of south-eastern Victoria.", "Mr Fahey also said keeping large swathes of native bushland protected from invasive species could\u00a0 \"act as a climate change refuge\"."]
